snippet: The BBC rejected calls to ban the song “Ding Dong! The Witch Is Dead” from its airwaves on Friday, after the apparent success of a Facebook campaign to celebrate the death of Margaret Thatcher by driving it up the British singles chart.
abstract: The BBC rejected calls to ban the song “Ding Dong! The Witch Is Dead” from its airwaves on Friday, after the apparent success of a Facebook campaign to celebrate the death of Margaret Thatcher by driving it up the British singles chart.

headline.main: BBC Won't Ban 'Ding Dong! The Witch Is Dead,' Adopted as Anti-Thatcher Anthem
headline.print_headline: ‘Ding Dong’ The Song Stays On, BBC Says
